name: Me, You & Our Dream
description:
Anwar and Hani were best friends. They have a dream to get into their favorite university. Can they really reach it?

This is our first game, so your opinion will be our passion to develop more games.  You all can insert it on the comments section below or you can email us on sorrowinrain107@gmail.com . Hope you enjoy it and thank you very much.

This game is presented to HMIF ITB / Informatics College Students Union, Bandung Technology Institute.

Oh, also we want to say thank you very much to Matthew Pablo with the Music. Don't forget to visit http://www.matthewpablo.com
